accepted_predicates.notes: Same product code, same intended use (WSI viewer + AI-assisted ROI detection), same safety class B IEC 62304 lifecycle
Supporting predicate for WSI display functionality; no AI component

se_conclusion: PathSight AI is substantially equivalent to K242244 (FullFocus Digital Pathology System). Both devices are SaMD providing whole-slide image viewing and AI-assisted region-of-interest detection as decision support for pathologists, cleared under 21 CFR 892.2050 with IEC 62304 software lifecycle documentation.
reviewer_notes: SaMD submission. Cybersecurity documentation required per FDA 2023 guidance. Software documentation package (IEC 62304 lifecycle records) must be complete. Clinical validation data must include sensitivity/specificity with confidence intervals on an independent test set.
